Package it.uninsubria.launcher

Class LauncherApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.uninsubria.launcher.LauncherApp
public class LauncherApp extends javafx.application.Application
Main application class for the Book Recommender System Launcher. Provides a GUI interface to check system prerequisites, start server, and launch client applications.

This launcher performs the following functions:

  • System environment checking (Java, Maven, PostgreSQL)
  • Server process management (start/stop monitoring)
  • Client application launching
  • Language switching support
  • Process monitoring and cleanup

The launcher ensures proper startup sequence and provides user feedback for all operations. It supports multiple client instances and monitors server availability.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Book Recommender Team

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Starts the JavaFX application and initializes the launcher interface. Sets up the main stage, loads FXML, and initializes monitoring services.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage for this application

    • initialize

      private void initialize()

    • finishInitialization

      private void finishInitialization()
      Completa l'inizializzazione dopo che la finestra è visibile. Questo evita di bloccare il rendering iniziale della UI. Ottimizzazioni implementate: - refreshUITexts() posticipato per non rallentare l'avvio - initializeStatusArea() usa StringBuilder invece di multiple appendText() - Riduzione di Platform.runLater calls durante inizializzazione

    • initializeStatusArea

      private void initializeStatusArea()
      Inizializza l'area di stato in modo efficiente costruendo tutto in una volta

    • onCheckEnvironment

      private void onCheckEnvironment()
      Handles the check environment button click. Performs system prerequisite checking for Java, Maven, and PostgreSQL. Updates UI with results and enables/disables buttons based on check outcome.

    • onRunServer

      private void onRunServer()
      Handles the run server button click. Starts the Book Recommender server process and monitors its startup. Updates UI to reflect server running state and enables client launching.

    • onRunClient

      private void onRunClient()
      Handles the run client button click. Launches a new client application instance. Manages client process lifecycle and UI state updates.

    • onLanguageChanged

      private void onLanguageChanged()
